sense.name: an organization
sense.examples: Lots of large enterprises are springing up in the southern U.S. A growing enterprise must have a bold leader.

sense.name: an endeavor
sense.commentary: A project or an attempt at something new.
sense.examples: Howard has proven that fixing a dripping faucet can be a risky enterprise.

sense.name: a person's initiative
sense.commentary: Readiness to embark on bold new ventures.
sense.examples: Team A's lack of enterprise is to blame for their losing the competition. I can tell from Jack's attitude that he is a man of great enterprise.
